title: Louisville campus police reviewing escort allegations
text:
> Indiana Louisville campus police reviewing escort allegations Louisville head coach Rick Pitino responds to a question following an NCAA college basketball team's intrasquad scrimmage Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Louisville, Ky. (AP Photo/Timothy D. Easley)
